title: Secure raises: A fair deal boosts the pay of Downtown guards
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
While most of Pittsburgh sleeps, security guards patrol buildings, earning low wages on a shift that disrupts family life and circadian rhyt...
